section.p: An act or process of verifying the results of counts, etc.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] imagingDate with data type Point In Time
Contains the Date and time the Imaging was performed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] siteMarkDate with data type Point In Time
Contains the Date and time the Site Marked was performed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] tovDate with data type Point In Time
Contains date and time the TOV modified.
